def.dt: :a small round fruit that is usually red or black see color picture on page C5
:a tree on which this fruit grows called also cherry tree
:the wood of a cherry tree The kitchen cabinets are made of cherry. called also cherry wood
:a bright red color called also cherry red see color picture on page C3

utxt.vi: a cherry table [=a table made of cherry wood]

def.dt: :a round firecracker that makes a loud noise when it explodes

:to pick or accept the best people or things in a group + obj Hollywood's biggest stars can cherry-pick the best projects and directors. no obj elite colleges that can cherry-pick from the best students available
:a very small red or orange tomato or a plant that produces such tomatoes
